name: NewPrixmix
description: NewPrixmix is made in an effort to stop using Kasm Workspaces and their closed-source Web UI and API. [NewPrixmixManager](https://github.com/ka-studios/NewPrixmixManager) creates, destroys, and suspends docker containers asynchronously while streaming them to the end user via [noVNC](https://github.com/noVNC/noVNC) ## Progress Total: 50% Done\ Backend: ~90% Done (Some more touchups needed)\ Frontend: 50% Done, we are cooking \ NewPrixmixManager: 100% Done, nothing here needs work
author: UltraBrowse
